reviews.text:
The Figura Femenina is a sculpture by Enric Casanovas featuring a female figure with a naked torso and holding her hair with her left hand. Sadly, apart from the holds of her tunic, there is hardly any detail in the statue. If there was any details to begin with, it’s ben worn away.

This statue is part of a sculptural ensemble by the big fountain in the north part of Placa de Catalunya.

There are some really wonderful statues in Plaza de Catalunya. Figura Femenina is just a representative sample! Absolutely beautiful copies of classical art. They are some of the stunning jewels that adorn this great Plaza.

Free.
24/7
Visit Duration: 5 minutes.
Plaza Catalunia.

A beautiful sculpture among the set of sculptures of the Plaza de Cataluña was created between 1927 and 1929. 

Finally, 28 works were installed: 
1-Maternidad 
2-Young
3-The smith 
4-Woman with child and piccolo 5-Female figure 
6-Juventud
7-Pastor of the flute 
8-Navigation
9-Barcelona
10-Montserrat
11-Hercules 
12-Woman with an angel 
13-Tarragona
14-Source of the six putti
15-Lérida
16-Woman with image of the Virgin , 17-The popular spirit 
18-Shepherd of the eagle
19-Pomona
20-Wisdom
21-The goddess
22-Work
23-Emporion
24-Pescador
25-Woman
26- Montseny
27-Gerona

Figura Femenina is located in arguably Barcelona's most famous plaza namely Plaça De Catalunya. 
There are several great statues in this square and this very feminine statue looks fantastic, beautifully detailed and very animated, it looks cool and is very photogenic indeed as are all the other statues in this vibrant plaza.
The statue offers great photographic opportunities and is most definitely well worth checking out if your in the area.

On the northeast side of Plaza de Cataluna there is an entrance surrounded by two columns.
On the right column there are two spulptures.
Figura Femenina is one of them.
Figura Femenina is a bronze sculpture made by Josep Limona in 1928
